description:
Used by more than 85 million entrepreneurs and small businesses worldwide, the Wordpress Content Management System (CMS) is the #1 website builder available. There is nothing more important than how your business' products, services and messaging are presented to an online audience.

Using Wordpress allows you to perfectly introduce and manage your online presence. In this course, we teach advanced Wordpress developments topics such as;

1. Effective homepage set-up and design

2. When and where to insert banner ads. sidebar ads and other direct calls to action

3. How Wordpress sliders increase visitor engagement as well as profits

4. The only 5 pages any business website needs to be successful

5. Why plugins and widgets matter for increasing profitability and how to set them up

6. Setting up blog posts that will increase website subscribers and paying customers

7. Setting user permissions for maximum readership engagement

8. How to integrate social media components into web design

and many more topics! Join is today and learn how to set-up a Wordpress website which will take your business to the next level!
title: Wordpress Development
